projects.name: Restaurant Reservation System
projects.description: A MERN stack web app for managing restaurant table reservations, with online booking and a contact form to handle customer inquiries.

projects.name: Amazon Clone
projects.description: A static Amazon clone built using HTML and CSS, replicating the homepage layout and design.

projects.name: SilverSpoon Restaurant Website
projects.description: A responsive restaurant website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring menu sections and a contact form for customer inquiries.

projects.name: Todo App
projects.description: A simple and interactive task management app built with React, featuring real-time date and time display, task addition, completion, and deletion, along with a 'Clear All' option.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring a responsive layout, player turn tracking, and a reset button for replaying.
